Html:
Hi, I just found this tool and wanted to give it a try so I asked it to open the dwmapi.dll which is used in Vista for Aero glass functions but the tool wasn't able to open it and gave the following error:

---------------------------
Error
---------------------------
Could not load assembly 'C:\Windows\System32\dwmapi.dll'.

Could not load file or assembly 'file:///C:\Windows\System32\dwmapi.dll' or one of its dependencies. The module was expected to contain an assembly manifest.
---------------------------
OK  
---------------------------

Is this a problem or is this dll incompatible in some way?
What menu did you attempt to open this file through?  More specifically, which tab had focus when you attempted to open the assembly?

jaredp110680 wrote:
What menu did you attempt to open this file through?  More specifically, which tab had focus when you attempted to open the assembly?


File > Open while on the SigExp tab.

Since as far as I can see there is no Open option while on the other tabs.
